sentences.caption: The professor stands at the forefront of the classroom, a projector screen displaying a colorful economics diagram behind him, engaging the students with a lecture on market dynamics
He gestures towards the screen with his right hand, highlighting the flow between labor and capital markets in the diagram
Mid-sentence, he pauses to point at a specific area of the graph, clarifying the concept of supply and demand to the class
Dressed in a light beige blazer and glasses, his professional attire commands respect while he articulates complex economic interactions
With a projector remote in his left hand, he transitions between slides, ensuring the visual aids complement his verbal explanations
Occasionally, he steps aside, allowing the students an unobstructed view of the examples on the screen
The professor's posture is erect, exuding confidence as he navigates through the intricacies of economic theories
His position in the well-lit room, just off-center from the projector screen, allows for an interactive space where he can engage with both the visual material and his audience
He maintains eye contact with the students, fostering an environment of open communication for any questions
His lecture is animated, his passion for the subject evident in the enthusiasm of his voice and the vigor of his movements
